ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Improved Statistics section with new UI and date range selection (issue #17) - Added tooltips to graphs - Added event popups ignore list (issue #46) - Improved Media Server and Receiver widget - Fixed bug in Net.SendMail also affecting Security Alarm System app (issue #88) - Fixed web service call handling in jkUtils OpenWeatherMap and SolarAltitude apps - Fixed bug in error reporting for Javascript automation programs - Fixed some bugs in js/api web service calls (introduced with r474 js/api refactoring) - Optimized DLNA/UPnP MIG interface and fixed some bugs (not disposing objects when disabled; not setting device type to MediaTransmitter for media browser nodes) - Removed all System.Windows.Forms and System.Drawing references from UPnP library (hopefully making it more stable)
